title: Add Comments Feature to Tasks/Tickets
description:
Implement a commenting system for tasks/tickets that allows users to add notes, observations, and updates throughout the task lifecycle.

**Requirements:**
- Add comments field to task JSON structure
- Store comment text, author reference, and timestamp
- UI component to display existing comments
- UI form to add new comments
- Comments should be stored in the same task JSON file
- Consider adding future 'Convert to Issue' button (disabled for now)

**Technical Implementation:**
- Extend task schema with 'comments' array
- Each comment: { id, text, author, timestamp, type: 'comment' }
- Backend API endpoints for CRUD operations on comments
- Frontend components: CommentsList, CommentForm
- Integration with existing TaskModal and TaskDetailPage

**Future Considerations:**
- 'Convert to Issue' functionality (button should be added but disabled)
- Comment threading/replies
- Comment editing/deletion
- Notification system for comment updates

subtasks.title: Extend task JSON schema with comments field
Create backend API endpoints for comments CRUD
Integrate comments in TaskModal and TaskDetailPage
